Class Thing

java.lang.Object
  Thing
Direct Known Subclasses:
AWPBullet, Hero, TEnemy, TGridded, TItem, TTool
public class Thing
extends java.lang.Object

This represents an object that can be put in the game.

Author:
Reed Weichler
